entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
